name: Chad the Wiz
description:
Chad the Wiz (or Yelling Wizard) is a 2D game where you find yourself defending your kingdom from hordes of dangerous demons that will annihilate your people if you don’t annihilate them first. Use spells to so, summon fireballs to take down tough opponents, call down lightning storms to affect a wide area and slow down the wave, and punch and kick if they get too close for comfort. Finally, when the demon numbers are cut thin, strike the final blow on the demon leader by chanting a final destructive spell.

This game is for free and available on PC and is inspired by Skyrim’s spells and Xbox’s Kinect voice commands.

Voice Controls are:

  • Fire - to summon a fireball
  • Kick - to kick the enemy
